properties.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Lake Mead National Recreation Area
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 29 at 2:17PM PST until March 1 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph
expected.

* WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In
Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area.

* WHEN...From 7 AM PST /8 AM MST/ to 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves could result in dangerous
boating conditions on Lake Mead Sunday morning. These winds
will create very choppy waters and generate large waves, which
could capsize or swamp small craft. If you do venture out onto
the lakes, avoid the open water and stay close to shore or in
protected coves and inlets.
properties.instruction:
Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds
and rough waves can overturn small craft.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM PST /8 AM MST/ TO 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ SUNDAY
